message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
